name: truth_emotion
prompt: Discuss why people sometimes prefer comforting lies to uncomfortable truths.
decoded: People often prefer comforting lies to uncomfortable truths because they provide a sense of safety and security. They allow individuals to avoid facing difficult emotions, thoughts, or situations, which can be stressful and emotionally taxing. Additionally, comforting lies can help maintain a sense of normalcy and control, which can be reassuring and calming.
